channel.title: node on 打工人日记
channel.description: Recent content in node on 打工人日记

item.title: node学习01
item.description: node操作mysql 第一步：引入mysql模块 var mysql = require('mysql'); 第二步：建立连接 var connection = mysql.createConnection( { host:'localhost', user: 'root', password: 'Gepoint', database: 'mqtt' }); connection.
